DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Plant Sterol-Enriched Soymilk Versus Plain Soymilk Volunteers With High LDL-Cholesterol
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , prospective , randomize , double-blinded , controlled-trial study hypercholesterolemic volunteer ( serum LDL-C > 130 mg/dL ) . After initial assessment screening period , eligible subject randomize receive either plant sterol soluble fiber-enriched soymilk ( SFSM ) plain soymilk ( SM ) 360 mL/day ( 2 package day ) 8 week . The participant might take study product snack , first one morning second one afternoon . It possible take meal , however take meal highly suggest . A physical examination ( include vital sign , height , weight , body mass index , waist circumference , systemic evaluation ) perform visit , every 2 week . Concurrent medication usage record visit study well . Three-day per week food intake weekly exercise record evaluate every visit . It recommend every participant follow dietary control lifestyle modification improve hypercholesterolemia entire study . Details overall product satisfaction evaluate participant 2 8 week study product consumption ( visit 2 5 ) . To evaluate compliance , participant ask collect return empty package investigator every 2 week visit 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 . More 90 % study product consumption would consider eligible on-going subject . Venous blood sample collect eligible subject pre-treatment ( screening period ; day -7 ) , every 2 week treatment ( visit 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 ; end week 2 , 4 , 6 8 ) test lipid profile fast blood sugar ( FBS ) . Adverse event , , record immediately study enrollment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female , age > 18 year 2 . If female , subject either postmenopausal surgically sterilize , negative urine pregnancy test within 7 day prior enrollment use adequate contraception study 3 . Has LDLC > 130 mg/dL 4 . If subject treat cholesterollowering agent prior admission , he/she must take medication regularly stable dose least 8 week 5 . Provided write informed consent prior admission study . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Has history organ transplantation 2 . Hypersensitivity soy bean specific allergy ingredient soymilk 3 . Has take medication affect serum cholesterol level , oral contraceptive pill , high dose diuretic betablockers , antiretroviral protease inhibitor , tegretol , anabolic steroid , unless drug consume dosage > 8 week prior admission study 4 . Has serum triglyceride â‰¥ 400 mg/dL 5 . Immunocompromised status , include debilitate state malignancy 6 . Has consume immunosuppressive agent cyclosporine , tacrolimus , azathioprine , chemotherapeutic agent 7 . Active liver , renal thyroid diseases 8 . Recent myocardial infarction stroke within 3 month prior admission 9 . Has recently admit hospital due illness within 2 month prior admission 10 . Frequent alcoholic consumption > 2 week ; beer > 360 mL , alcohol > 45 mL , wine > 150 mL female , beer > 720 mL , whisky > 90 mL , wine > 300 mL male time 11 . HasGI symptom nausea , vomit , loss appetite , premature satiety , diarrhea , chronic constipation 12 . Consume study product le 90 % treatment period 13 . Pregnancy breast feed woman 14 . Has previously admit study 15 . Lack ability willingness give inform consent 16 . Start take medication may affect serum lipid profile immunosuppressive agent study 17 . Receiving dietary supplement plant sterols/ stanols and/ fiber .
